H0.text: Which artist, a member of the Order of Merit, was born in Bradford in July 1937. David Bomberg

H1.text: Which artist, a member of the Order of Merit, was born in Bradford in July 1937. Patrick Caulfield

H2.text: Which artist, a member of the Order of Merit, was born in Bradford in July 1937. Howard Hodgkin

H3.text: Which artist, a member of the Order of Merit, was born in Bradford in July 1937. Hockney

A4.text: David Hockney (born 9 July 1937) is an English painter, draughtsman, printmaker, stage designer, and photographer.

A5.text: He was appointed to the Order of Merit, an honour restricted to 24 members at any one time for their contributions to the arts and sciences.
